name: Imbroglio Demo
description:
Imbroglio is a Sliding puzzle game in a retro wave aesthetic. Your goal is to roll a ball on the target.

There are 5 differents mechanics to challenge your mind over 60 levels in this free demo version. There are also two game modes, the Step mode to do the Par, and the Fill mode to roll over each tile.

Stop tile : Stop the player instead of rolling in a wall.

Arrow : Redirect the player in the arrow direction.

Portal : Teleport the player between two portal in the same direction.

Switch : Alight all switch to finish the level.

Bumper : Allow the player to jump over tile and wall.
